doc:
Ruth Nelson (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruth_Nelson_(actress) 0 Ruth Nelson (August 2, 1905 – September 12, 1992) was an American stage and film actress. She is known for her roles in such films as Wilson, A Tree Grows in Brooklyn, Humoresque, 3 Women, The Late Show and Awakenings. She was the wife of John Cromwell, whom she acted alongside on multiple occasions. Ruth_Nelson ( August_2_,_1905 – September_12_,_1992 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actress . She is_known for her_roles in such_films as Wilson , A_Tree Grows in Brooklyn , Humoresque , 3_Women , The_Late_Show and Awakenings . She was the_wife of John_Cromwell , whom she acted alongside on multiple_occasions .
